mapper.select: SELECT iic.id,iic.bid,iic.feeType, CONVERT(iic.fee_amount,DECIMAL(18,2)) AS feeAmount, CONVERT(iic.fee_amount/i.investTotal*100,DECIMAL(18,2)) AS feeRatio FROM (SELECT id,bid,CASE WHEN fee_code = '02' THEN '承销及保荐费用' WHEN fee_code = '03' THEN '承销费用' WHEN fee_code = '04' THEN '保荐费用' WHEN fee_code = '05' THEN '原股东承销费用' WHEN fee_code = '06' THEN '律师费用' ELSE '' END AS feeType,fee_amount FROM ipo_issue_cost WHERE bid = #{bid} AND fee_type = '0' AND fee_code NOT in ('00','01') UNION SELECT id,bid,(SELECT mcl.label_name FROM maa_conf_label mcl WHERE mcl.label_code = 'IPO_AUDIT_FEE' AND mcl.label_value = fee_code) AS feeType,fee_amount FROM ipo_issue_cost WHERE bid = #{bid} AND fee_type = '1' UNION SELECT id,bid,(SELECT mcl.label_name FROM maa_conf_label mcl WHERE mcl.label_code = 'IPO_ISSUE_FEE' AND mcl.label_value = fee_code) AS feeType,fee_amount FROM ipo_issue_cost WHERE bid = #{bid} AND fee_type = '2') iic, (SELECT SUM(invest_plan) AS investTotal FROM ipo_invest_item WHERE bid = #{bid}) i

SELECT lfi.PARVALUE AS parValue, lfi.ISSUEPRICE AS issuePrice, CONVERT(lfi.SHAREISSUED/10000,DECIMAL(18,2)) AS shareIssued, lfi.ISSUEDRATIO AS issuedRatio, CONVERT(lfi.SUMFINA/10000,DECIMAL(18,2)) AS sumFina, CONVERT(lfi.NETSUMFINA/10000,DECIMAL(18,2)) AS netSumFina, CONVERT(lfi.EXSENUMBSE/10000,DECIMAL(18,2)) AS exseNumBse, lfi.ISSUEMETHOD AS issueMethod, lf.EPSISSUEB AS epsIssueB, lf.EPSISSUEA AS epsIssueA, lf.PEISSUEA peIssueA, CONVERT(lfp.SHARESTRATEGICPLACE/10000,DECIMAL(18,2)) AS sharesTrategicPlace, CONVERT(lfp.SHAREOVERPLACE/10000,DECIMAL(18,2)) AS shareOverPlace, CONVERT(lfp.SHAREISSUEON/10000,DECIMAL(18,2)) AS shareIssueOn, CONVERT(lfp.SHAREPLACEOFF/10000,DECIMAL(18,2)) AS sharePlaceOff, (SELECT c.PARAMCHNAME FROM CFP_PVALUE c WHERE c.NIPMID = '127000000005078644' AND lfu.UWMETHOD = c.PARAMCODE) AS uwMethod FROM LICO_FP_ISSUEBASICINFO linfo LEFT JOIN LICO_FP_ISSUEBASICINFO lfi ON linfo.FINANCECODE = lfi.FINANCECODE LEFT JOIN LICO_FP_ISSUEFINA lf ON linfo.FINANCECODE = lf.FINANCECODE LEFT JOIN LICO_FP_ISSUEPLACE lfp ON linfo.FINANCECODE = lfp.FINANCECODE LEFT JOIN LICO_FP_UNDERWRITING lfu ON linfo.FINANCECODE = lfu.FINANCECODE WHERE linfo.COMPANYCODE = #{orgCode} AND linfo.FINATYPE = '001' limit 1

SELECT lfi.share_value AS parValue, lfi.issue_price AS issuePrice, CONVERT(lfi.issue_size/10000,DECIMAL(18,2)) AS shareIssued, lfi.issue_ratio AS issuedRatio, CONVERT(lfi.invest_total/10000,DECIMAL(18,2)) AS sumFina, CONVERT(lfi.invest_act/10000,DECIMAL(18,2)) AS netSumFina, CONVERT(lfi.transfer_amount/10000,DECIMAL(18,2)) AS exseNumBse, lfi.issue_method AS issueMethod, lf.per_share_pre AS epsIssueB, lf.per_share_after AS epsIssueA, lf.pe_after peIssueA, CONVERT(lfp.zlpssl/10000,DECIMAL(18,2)) AS sharesTrategicPlace, CONVERT(lfp.cepssl/10000,DECIMAL(18,2)) AS shareOverPlace, CONVERT(lfp.wsfxsl/10000,DECIMAL(18,2)) AS shareIssueOn, CONVERT(lfp.wxpssl/10000,DECIMAL(18,2)) AS sharePlaceOff, (SELECT c.code_name FROM sa_code c WHERE c.code_no = 'IPO_ISSUED' AND lfu.sell_way = c.code_value AND c.valid_flag= '1') AS uwMethod FROM rep_issue_info linfo LEFT JOIN rep_issue_info lfi ON linfo.financing_code = lfi.financing_code LEFT JOIN ipo_issue_financial lf ON linfo.financing_code = lf.financing_code LEFT JOIN st_issue_place lfp ON linfo.financing_code = lfp.financing_code LEFT JOIN ipo_underwrite lfu ON linfo.financing_code = lfu.financing_code WHERE linfo.org_code = #{orgCode} AND linfo.fin_type = '001' AND linfo.source_del = '0' limit 1
select id,bid,main_remark remark,bussiness_type businessType from strategic_placement_main where bid = #{id} limit 1

select m.id,m.pid,m.strategic_investor_name strategicInvestorName,(select label_name from maa_conf_label where label_code = "IPO_SHARE_HOLDER_TYPE" and label_value=m.shareholder_type)AS shareholderType,m.initial_number_single initialNumberSingle, m.allotted_number_single allottedNumberSingle,m.allotted_amount_single allottedAmountSingle,m.sales_restriction_period_month salesRestrictionPeriodMonth ,m.initial_number_ten_thousand initialNumberTenThousand,m.allotted_number_ten_thousand allottedNumberTenThousand,m.allotted_amount_ten_thousand allottedAmountTenThousand from strategic_placement_sub m where pid = #{id}
select m.`OPEN`,m.NEW,m.HIGH,m.LOW,m.TVOL,m.trade_date,m.LCLOSE from vc_trad_sk_daily m where m.SECURITY_CD = #{companyCode} and m.trade_date >= #{processTime} ORDER BY trade_date asc limit 20;
